Title: Potential SQL injection vulnerability
Resolution: Replaced all raw queries with prepared statements

Title: Weak password policy
Resolution: Implemented strong password validation with regex

Title: Session fixation vulnerability
Description: Session ID not regenerated after login
Resolution: Configured session fixation protection in Spring Security

Title: CSRF protection not enabled
Resolution: Enabled CSRF protection for form submissions

Title: Tight coupling between layers
Resolution: Implemented proper layered architecture with services

Title: Inconsistent error handling
Resolution: Standardized exception handling with global handlers

Title: Magic numbers in code
Resolution: Replaced magic numbers with named constants

Title: Missing database indexes
Resolution: Added indexes on frequently queried columns

Title: Missing breadcrumbs
Description: No navigation breadcrumbs in admin panel

Title: Limited test coverage
Resolution: Future enhancement - add more unit tests
